original_text: Then Moses and Aaron brought all the people to meet in front of the rock. Moses said to them, ‘Listen now, you people who refuse to obey God. It seems that we must bring water out of this rock for you!’
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 회중을 그 반석 앞에 모으고 모세가 그들에게 이르되 반역한 너희여 들으라 우리가 너희를 위하여 이 반석에서 물을 내랴 하고

sentences.original_text: Then Moses and Aaron brought all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모세와 아론은 모든 사람들을 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: to meet in front of the rock
you people who refuse to obey God
It seems that we must bring water
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 물을 가져와야 하는 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: out of this rock for you
